item.title: python快速求解矩阵最小（大）特征值
item.description: from generate_data import * from scipy.sparse.linalg import eigsh from numpy.linalg import eigh from time import time # 生成一个实对称矩阵 theta1 = generate_theta1(500,'BA',0.1) time1 = time() for i in range(20): # 'SA' small algebra eigenvalues eigsh(theta1,which='SA',return_eigenvectors=False,k=1) time2 = time() print(time2-time1) time1 = time() for i in range(20): min(eigh(theta1)[0]) time2 = time() print(time2-time1) Output: 0.15729713439941406 0.6559879779815674
